# make sure that df only has samples for 1 asset id
def compute(df):
    
    R=list()
    c=list(df['Close'])
    for i in range(df.shape[0]):
        future=c[min([i+16,df.shape[0]-1])]
        past=c[min([i+1,df.shape[0]-1])]
        R.append(future/past)
    df['R']=R
    df['R']=np.log(df['R'])
    df['pred']=np.exp(df['R'])-1
    return df
